title: I used to have the new client when it was in Alpha but it accidentally got deleted. Please Help.
body: Please someone Help Me. I used to have the alpha client, but it accidentally got deleted. Im really frustrated since all of my friends already have it and I cant seem to get it. I really want to try all the new features like the practice tool, but I cant. Someone help me please.

replies.body:
Not to worry, friend! You can easily upgrade to the Beta Client from your patcher. There's a button in the top-right to upgrade, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if you run into any issues with this upgrade.
Thanks you so much this helped a lot. Thanks.{{champion:157}}
